column4: I am trying to install the nvidia beta drivers (for Beryl) but ran into a problem. Is anyone here able to help?
I am following this HOWTO and I am at the "Installing nVIDIA Beta Driver" section
But I am stuck adding Repository
It says to add a rep. in the following command:
so it should look like this, right?
sudo echo -e "\n## nVidia driver repository\ndeb http://nvidia.limitless.lupine.me.uk/ubuntu edgy stable" >> /etc/apt/sources.list
or did I get it wrong?
Just do it manually. gksu gedit /etc/apt/source.list :)
And then copy paste the repo in the text file and click save :)
ok, I just didn't understand what the line the HOWTO suggested did
is it just doing it in a fancy way?
I see you use gksu. is that for extra "vulnerable" files or something? Are there more "su"s?
It is like su but for GUI apps
